resources.string: Keep a personal diary, without writing down a single word!
The more entries you have, the more useful statistics we can provide. You can use charts to identify patterns in your life.
Once you recognize patterns, you can work on replacing old unwanted habits!
Pick a current or a past day. If you are an actual time traveler we are terribly sorry.
This day is yet to come

With an increasing number of entries you get more and more useful statistics about the fucks you give. You can use the detailed statistics to find patterns in your life. If you do not like the found patterns you now have the possibility to change them
Keep a personal diary about the things that really matters. You can add personal notes about the situations to better analyze them afterwords.
Once you internalized your patterns, you canstart working on replacing or changing them. Get rid of unwanted and bad habits and startbrand new ones. Your life will get better and better!
